text_block_list.text:
It had been a few days since the start of Cesario's 
story, to become 『A guiding light for future Uma 
Musume』. We got a request to do a photo shoot.
choice_data_list: 『Daily Life of Uma Musume and Trainer』, huh?

text_block_list.text:
It probably focused on 『Popular Uma Musume』, so not 
just us. Probably the girls that ran the Selection 
race with her, Rhein Kraft, Air Messiah, Daring Heart――

This generation was filled with talented girls who 
attracted attention. Appearing in that environment would 
probably be a good start to becoming a 『Guiding Light』
choice_data_list: Let's do our best at the photo shoot too!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for handling today's photo shoot. 
We hope we can live up to your expectations.

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
It's fine if you keep things more informal. The theme 
is school-life together with your trainer, after all!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. ……Oh. 
Looks like Trainer has arrived, though――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Um……Trainer, what's with those clothes? 
You're dressed much more smartly than normal.
choice_data_list: This is important so I wanted to do my best!

text_block_list.text:
To look better in the photos, I bought a new suit and 
had my hair done at a salon. My preparations were perfect!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I see. That's reassuring. 
Then Trainer too, I'm looking forward to working with you.

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
Then to start with, some photos when meeting up! 
Please think about the image of your normal day!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Understood. Then――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I'd like to consult with you about the next race.
choice_data_list: Sounds good! Let's get to it!
Sounds good! Let's get to it!

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
T-Trainer-san, I know you're a little fired up but 
……remember, it's supposed to be a meeting. Yeah, 
let's try to convey a serious atmosphere!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Next is, chatting while on break. 
Then――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer. I made a lot of side dishes today, 
if you'd like, how about joining me for lunch?

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
That's good～! Even with that dignified appearance, 
it's still a cozy atmosphere! Trainer-san――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Um, Trainer. I think you might be over acting…… 
Your normal smile would make the best photo……
choice_data_list: Eh? Am I trying too hard……!?

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
W-weeell……Um, how about taking a short break!? If you're not 
used to it, a photoshoot can be really tiring, after all.

I thought I was doing this for Cesario, but it 
seems like my enthusiasm backfired. I was just 
acting like an idiot who couldn't read the mood.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
No, that's not true. Please don't worry about it. But, are you okay? 
It seems like you're putting quite a lot of effort in to it.
choice_data_list: But your future students will see the photo!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……? What do you mean……?

With her success in racing her name will remain in history, 
once she becomes the 『Guiding Light』, people will look 
back and see these photos――that's what I tell her.
choice_data_list: That's why I need to keep it together……!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
So that's what you were thinking about today's 
photoshoot……and why you bought a new suit.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Even though we don't know when we'll even reach that point. 
To think you're already looking ahead and preparing for it――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Really, I'm glad you're my 『Partner』 ……Thank you very much. 
I can't think of any better words to describe how I feel now.
(Click!)

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I'm sorry, even though you're on break! You both had 
such good expressions on your faces that I couldn't help it!

text_block_list.name: Photographer
text_block_list.text:
But, because of that, I got the best shot of the day! Not with words, 
but with the look in your eyes, as expected of a noteworthy duo!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, I'm glad we could live up to expectations. Looks like 
we were able to leave behind a memory of how we normally are.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Then, from now on, let's try to meet every situation as our 
normal selves. So there can be many pictures of us like that.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Fuu. Good work throughout the day♪ 
I can't wait to show it to the girls I teach.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I can proudly tell them that Trainer 
was a passionate person from the start!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes, definitely! 
To me, that's the truth.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I think we should be grateful for today's 
photoshoot. I was able to learn more about 
Trainer, and understand just how passionate you are♪

Seeing how happy she was, I had a thought. 
I also wanted to know more about her, and deepen that trust.
